message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe holds great value for those seeking excellence in its category. Given its quality and features, I estimate its worth to be significantly higher than $150. Considering the exceptional craftsmanship and benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you for $200. This is an opportunity to secure a high-quality item at a price that reflects its true value. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
